No earlier than the final reference implementation and support for Organizations and if the framework is not performant enough: Rewrite the framework in C++. This will greatly reduce the amount of resources required to run on personal devices or in resource constrainted environments. The Apps can still be written in TS/JS since they'll compile via QuickJS. QuickJS can be directly linked into the binary further reducing resource requirements. In single user environments SqLite can also be linked in directly.
